TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StreamingResponse extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Implementation split between Response and ResponseEx. The basic response type sent over Bot Framework Protocol 3 with Streaming Extensions transports, equivalent to HTTP response messages.
